name: Cannondale Synapse Neo 1 E-Bicycle
description: Explore more of the open road, turn mountains into molehills, or just get out riding with that friend who’s tank never seems to run dry. Built on a light and stiff aluminum frame and outfitted with Shimano’s proven 105 groupset, the Synapse Neo has everything you’d want from an elite road bike, with one very significant bonus… a powerful Bosch® drive system.Bosch Active Line Plus 250W drive unit has 4 assist levels eco (40%), tour (100%), sport (180%) and turbo (270%).Drive unit is tuned with Actual Cadence Response (ACR) for ultra-smooth torque delivery (up to 50Nm) and a natural pedaling feel.Bosch Purion™ display for mode, battery status and more.Removable Bosch PowerTube™ 500 battery with Bosch 4A charger.To keep your battery at its best, follow the manufacturer’s storage and charging guidelines (e-Bike batteries can be very sensitive to cold temperatures).Smartform C1 alloy frame and carbon fork, with aggressive road bike geometry.SAVE™ micro-suspension uses strategically engineered flex zones in the rear triangle to smooth out the ride.Shimano 105 hydraulic disc brakes keep velocity under control in even the worst weather.2x11 drive train pairs 50-34T chain rings with an 11-34T cassette.Shimano 105 groupset with FSA Bosch cranks.Wheel sensor pairs with your phone via the free Cannondale app and uses Garmin™ technology to record your rides, provide your: time, speed, distance, calories, etc. and it even tells you about your carbon offset. The app also provides reminders for needed services, tracks service history and more.Wheel sensor works with ANT+® or Bluetooth® and uses an easily replaceable 2032 battery that lasts more than a year.Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for 2 years after purchase.

Grips/tape: Cannondale Grip Bar Tape w/ gel
